body: Hello, as you know i am Afronaut23 and i have made Avicus history in the past hour. I have entered 1st prestige on Nexus. This was not easy and took many hours of shrek'in nubs. Anyway i would like to thank my Mother and Father for supplying me with adequate internet source as well as the house i live in.

title: Afronaut23 has prestiged  in Nexus

Anyways, congratulations :)
